about_the_game:
Contents

  • 2014 DYO Prototype (15 playable levels)
  • Original Soundtrack (6 tracks; ~20 min. playtime; MP3 & FLAC)
  • Digital Production Artbook (PDF; 21 pages)
  • 6 High-Resolution Artworks
  • 4 Wallpapers (1080p)

2014 DYO Prototype

The 2014 prototype is the first fully functional version of DYO and not only contains 15 levels you haven't played yet in a completely different visual style, it even features some gameplay mechanics that didn't make it into the final game. This is a must-have for every true DYO connoisseur!

Disclaimer

The 2014 DYO prototype is only playable on keyboard / shared controller. As this is a very old version of DYO, we cannot provide any technical support. If your PC can run DYO, there is a good chance it will be able to run the prototype as well.

name: DYO - Collector's Edition Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Intel dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: The DYO Collector's Edition contains the original DYO soundtrack, several high-resolution artworks, a production art book, and wallpapers. Plus, you get a copy of the very first playable DYO prototype we made back in 2014!
